body.Subject: [ALERT] Suspicious behaviour Detected | User: @{outputs('User')} Contacted IP: @{outputs('ExtractedIP')}
body.Body:
Potential Malicious Use of Regsvr32 detected (T1218.010)

- User: @{outputs('User')}
- Image: @{outputs('Image')}
- Parent Image: @{outputs('ParentImage')}
- CommandLine: @{outputs('CommandLine')}
- Integrity Level: @{outputs('Integrity_level')}
- Conatacted IP: @{outputs('ExtractedIP')}
- VT Malicious Score: @{outputs('Compose')?['malicious']}
- VT Reputation Score: @{outputs('Compose')?['reputation']}


Recommended Actions: Investigate the process and isolate the host if confirmed.

body.Subject: [INFO] Non malicious use of Regsvr32 activity observed
body.Body:
Regsvr32 was observed contacting an external IP, but no malicious activity was reported by VirusTotal.

- User: @{outputs('User')}
- Image: @{outputs('Image')}
- Parent Image: @{outputs('ParentImage')}
- Command Line: @{outputs('CommandLine')}
- Integrity Level: @{outputs('Integrity_level')}
- Contacted IP: @{outputs('ExtractedIP')}
- VT Malicious Score: @{outputs('Compose')?['malicious']}
- VT Reputation Score: @{outputs('Compose')?['reputation']}

Action: No immediate response required. Log retained for visibility.
